import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Sidebar from"../Sidebar";import{Box,TextField}from"@mui/material";import{useNavigate,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{getSubcategory,updateSubcategory}from"../../../store/ActionCreators/SubCategoryActionCreator";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function UpdateSubCategory(){const[name,setName]=useState("");let navigate=useNavigate();let dispatch=useDispatch();let{id}=useParams();let SubCategoryStateData=useSelector(state=>state.SubCategoryStateData);function getInputData(e){setName(e.target.value);}async function postData(e){e.preventDefault();let item=SubCategoryStateData.slice(1).find(x=>x.name===name);if(item)alert("This Sub Category already exist!!");else{dispatch(updateSubcategory({id:id,name:name}));navigate("/admin/subcategory");}}function getApiData(){dispatch(getSubcategory());let item=SubCategoryStateData.slice(1).find(x=>x.id===Number(id));if(item)setName(item.name);}useEffect(()=>{getApiData();// eslint-disable-next-line
},[SubCategoryStateData.length]);const marTop={marginTop:"16px"};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container-fluid my-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-md-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"bg-primary text-light text-center w-100 p-2",children:"Sub Category"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{component:"form",onSubmit:postData,sx:{mt:"40px",display:"flex",justifyContent:"center",width:"100%"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{width:"80%",display:"flex",flexDirection:"column"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",mt:"8px",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Name",variant:"outlined",sx:marTop,required:true,inputProps:{minLength:3,maxLength:50},className:"fName",value:name,onChange:getInputData}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success rounded-1 p-2 w-50",onClick:()=>window.history.back(),children:"Back"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary rounded-1 p-2 w-50",children:"Update"})]})]})})})]})]})})});}
